arts.ttl: Serie A | Empoli 0-0 Cagliari: Dire stalemate suits Sardinians
arts.sum: Empoli and Cagliari shared the spoils in a disappointing stalemate that is far better for...

arts.ttl: Empoli vs. Cagliari, a direct clash!
arts.sum: Empoli have not won any of their last 15 league games (D4 L11) - their last win dates back to 8 December away to Hellas Verona (4-1) â€“ and could equal their longest streak of consecutive games without a win in Serie A: 16 matches in a row between December 2021 and April 2022, under Aurelio Andreazzoli. Empoli have lost six of their last seven home league games (D1), including the three most recent ones without scoring; only once have the Tuscans suffered four defeats in a row in Serie A, between June and September 2023 (in that case they also remained without scoring in that run).
